ParaDef.Info: The SDP ID for which to display information. Values-1 to 17407. ParamDefault: Default- All SDPs
Displays the SAP identifier for PW-SAPs. Values-1 to 10239.
Displays only SDPs matching with the specified far-end IP address. ParamDefault: Default- SDPs with any far-end IP address
Displays detailed SDP information. ParamDefault: Default- SDP summary output
Displays the last fifty SDP keepalive events for the SDP. ParamDefault: Default- SDP summary output
